data.title: 2007 Jordon Lifetime Achievement Award - Ligonier Ministries
data.snippet:
Orlando, Florida, July 16, 2007 ‚Äì Bestselling author and theologian Dr. R.C. Sproul became the 24th recipient of the prestigious Evangelical Christian Publishing Association‚Äôs Charles ‚ÄúKip‚Äù Jordon Lifetime Achievement Award at the International Christian Retail Show (‚ÄúICRS‚Äù) in Atlanta July 8‚Äì12, 2007.  This award, named in honor of Charles ‚ÄúKip‚Äù Jordon, publishing veteran of more than 25 years and former publisher of Word Publishing, is given to individuals each year for their exceptional contributions to the publishing industry. On July 9, 2007, Dr. R.C. Sproul was presented with this award. [...] ‚ÄúI was honored,‚Äù says Sproul. ‚ÄúIt is a profoundly humbling experience to get something like this. I never expected it and it was very gracious of them to bestow this honor on me.‚Äù Sproul joins the ranks of previous recipients such as the Reverend Billy Graham, Dr. James Dobson, Charles Swindoll, and Joni Eareckson-Tada, to name a few.

# 2007 Jordon Lifetime Achievement Award

Ligonier Updates

#### Presented by the Evangelical Christian Publishers Association (ECPA)

The prestigious Jordon Lifetime Achievement Award is presented to an individual each year for their exceptional contributions to the Christian publishing industry. On July 9, 2007, Dr. R.C. Sproul was presented with this award.

#### Local Author Receives Prestigious Lifetime Achievement Award

As a contract software engineer, I worked on small-medium sized projects for a range of clients, using a full-stack approach with technologies including TypeScript, GraphQL, PostgreSQL and Firebase to deliver high-quality solutions, services and applications.

### 510 Kickz LLC

Berkeley CA

Founder

July 2017 - September 2021

Founded a bulk aftermarket distribution company that specialized in footwear and apparel. Over $1M in lifetime sales with hundreds enterprise scale businesses, and direct to consumer.

Cloudflare co-hosted with TQ Ventures almost 200 developers in our SF office on the first night of developer week to talk about AI! Speakers included LangChain engineer Brace Sproul, OpenAI solutions architect Prashant M., and OpenAI solutions engineer Dave Leo, and South Park Commons founder fellow Jonathan Mortensen.

data.title: R. C. Sproul - Wikipedia
data.snippet:
| Sproul in 2006 |
| Born | Robert Charles Sproul  (1939-02-13)February 13, 1939  Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, U.S. |
| Died | December 14, 2017(2017-12-14) (aged 78)  Altamonte Springs, Florida, U.S. |
| Education |  Westminster College "Westminster College (Pennsylvania)") (BA)  Pittsburgh Theological Seminary (MDiv)  Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam (Doctorandus / MA)  Whitefield Theological Seminary (PhD) |
| Occupations |  Professor  author  pastor |
| Spouse | Vesta Sproul  ‚Äã (m. 1960)‚Äã  |
| Children | 2, Sherrie Lee Sproul (Dorotiak), R. C. Sproul Jr. |
| Ordination | UPCUSA (1965‚Äì1975)   PCA (1975‚Äì2017) |
|  |
| Theological work |
| Tradition or movement | Reformed (Presbyterianism)  Methodism (early years) | [...] Sproul was an advocate of Reformed theology in his many print, audio, and video publications, and advocated the Thomistic (classical) approaches to Christian apologetics, less common among Reformed apologists, most of whom prefer presuppositionalism.[citation needed] A dominant theme in his Renewing Your Mind lessons is the holiness and sovereignty of God. Sproul taught that headcovering should be practiced in churches as the ordinance is "rooted and grounded in creation". [...] Gerstner convinced Sproul to study under G. C. Berkouwer at the Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam (Free University of Amsterdam) in Holland, where he initiated study in 1964. Sproul was granted leave in 1965 due to his wife's second pregnancy and mother's illness (during which he was appointed to teach philosophy at Westminster College "Westminster College (Pennsylvania)")), and later resumed study at distance. He returned to Holland in 1969 to receive a doctorandus degree.

He married Vesta Voorhis in 1960 and had two children, Sherrie Dorotiak and Robert Craig Sproul.

Sproul was a passenger on the Amtrak train that derailed in the 1993 Big Bayou Canot train wreck, and sometimes gave firsthand accounts of the story.

## Career
